      • selectSearchResultsInEditor

        public static void selectSearchResultsInEditor(Editor editor,
                                               java.util.Iterator<? extends FindResult> resultIterator,
                                               int caretShiftFromSelectionStart)
        Creates a selection in editor per each search result. Existing carets and selections in editor are discarded.
        Parameters:
        caretShiftFromSelectionStart - if non-negative, defines caret position relative to selection start, for each created selection. if negative, carets will be positioned at selection ends

      • selectSearchResultInEditor

        public static boolean selectSearchResultInEditor(Editor editor,
                                                 FindResult result,
                                                 int caretShiftFromSelectionStart)
        Attempts to add a new caret to editor, with selection corresponding to given search result.
        Parameters:
        caretShiftFromSelectionStart - if non-negative, defines caret position relative to selection start, for each created selection. if negative, caret will be positioned at selection end
        Returns:
        true if caret was added successfully, false if it cannot be done, e.g. because a caret already exists at target position
